channel.title: MavensMate Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.30
item.description:
Version 0.30

This update is highly recommended. Thanks to @doublesharp for all fixes/enhancements in this release. Once you have updated MavensMate.app, be sure to update the appropriate Sublime Text plugins from the "Plugins" menu item.

  • Refresh from server fix
  • UTF-8 encoding fix
  • Index_apex_overlays fix
  • Open file on server

For full list of code changes: https://github.com/joeferraro/MavensMate/commits/master
